mapper.update: update risk_cust_factor_param set custid = #{custid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, customerid = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rectime = #{rectime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, drecamount = #{drecamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drecmaxtype = #{drecmaxtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trxwrongflag = #{trxwrongflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drecnum = #{drecnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, drecmaxamount = #{drecmaxamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drecmaxbankid = #{drecmaxbankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drecmaxcardno = #{drecmaxcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark10 = #{remark10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark9 = #{remark9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark8 = #{remark8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark7 = #{remark7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark6 = #{remark6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark5 = #{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark4 = #{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from risk_cust_factor_param t where 1=1
AND t.customerid = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND date_format(t.rectime,'%Y%m%d')= DATE_FORMAT(#{orderTime}, '%Y%m%d')
order by t.rectime DESC
